text: Hige'za sondia vahe'mo'za ke hugantu hugma hu'za, erisagnera osinkero, hagi satu zokago reta kesune, aza erisifi, e'i ana kemo Anumzamofo avon tafe'mo hu'nea ke eriama hu'ne, Zamagra amega kena'ni'a amu'no zamifi fagago hu'za eri'naze, zamagra nagri kenarera, taisi zokago re'naze.  (Sam-Zga 22:18) Anama kre'naza kante anteza sondi'a vahe'mo'za ana kemofo eri knare hu'naze.
